column4: Stanley: when running java 7 for my minecraft server (vanilla) the java process has a status of 'sleeping' and the process sits at 0% most of the time.
Even immediately after launching it with lots of CPU usage it is sleeping, then drops down to 0%
doesn't it wake up when required to do something?
it sounds like the lag is the problem, not the sleeping java... networking or similar problem, maybe?
